definition: thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: This first volume reveals the crucial initial steps for getting a short film off the ground.
sentences.chinese: 这是首卷，展现了一个上下车短片关键的第一步。

sentences.english: An edited version will also be played in movie theaters.
sentences.chinese: 剪辑版的短片也将在电影院上映。

sentences.english: This part try to find the Tornatore's habits of direction and personal characteristics from the video shoot.
sentences.chinese: 从短片中找寻托纳托雷的拍摄习惯和个人导演特色。

sentences.english: The film also stars a boy who plays the son.
sentences.chinese: 短片的主演还包括一位扮演儿子的男孩。

sentences.english: Making short-films, for directors, is an excellent practice.
sentences.chinese: 短片对于一个导演来说，是一个非常好的锻炼。

sentences.english: Tang has also written short novels and stage dramas, and directed theater productions.
sentences.chinese: 汤唯也写过短片小说和舞台戏，导演戏剧作品。

sentences.english: Amateurs were posting poems, short stories and serialized novels.
sentences.chinese: 业余者都是发表些诗，短片故事和连载小说。

sentences.english: His latest experimental short film Twitters and Fragrance is forthcoming.
sentences.chinese: 目前实验短片《鸟语花香》正在制作中。

sentences.english: She shot several short films in Italy and England.
sentences.chinese: 她曾在意大利和英国拍过若干短片。

sentences.english: Working his way up, he made a few short films that won a lot of praise.
sentences.chinese: 他逐步晋升，也拍了几部赢得许多好评的短片。

sentences.english: Learn about the history of the tarot cards in this free tarot card reading and deck history video clip.
sentences.chinese: 了解在这个自由塔罗牌读史的塔罗牌和甲板历史短片。

sentences.english: For example some of the clips were from the comedy shows The Simpsons and Seinfeld.
sentences.chinese: 一些短片是来自喜剧“辛普森一家与塞恩菲尔德”。

sentences.english: Could you tell us about your animated short X-Ray Vision?
sentences.chinese: 你能告诉我们关于你的视觉动画短片，X射线？

sentences.english: Derik and Kyle have produced 19 episodes at the time of this writing.
sentences.chinese: 在撰写本文的时候，二人已经制作了19个短片。

sentences.english: Thus, we have put short quiz to a climax.
sentences.chinese: 于是，我们把短片竞猜这一部分推向了高潮。

sentences.english: Each of the five filmmakers will edit a 10-minute version of their film.
sentences.chinese: 五位作者分别编辑一个10分钟的短片。

definition: variant of 紀錄片|纪录片[ji4 lu4 pian4]
fragment (of speech etc)/extract (from book etc)/episode (of story etc)
